title: About - SN Silos - Land of Technology

about-hero.heading: About SN Silos
about-hero.description: SN Silos and SoilSense collects soil and environment data around the farm and transforms it into useful information with the help of IoT based devices and sensors to monitor the soil health (crop field). The information is easy to access and provides a wide sense of field conditions

our-vision.heading: What we aim to provide
our-vision.description: IoT based devices and sensors to monitor the soil health (crop field). The information is easy to access and provides a wide sense of field conditions.

data.name: Our Vision
data.about: To make a sustainable future in agriculture Industry with the right inclusion of technology and innovation

data.name: Our Mission
data.about: To provide a cost effective method to increase the yeild with the help of organic means and technology
